email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope you're doing well. We have a spot inquiry for 5000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric ton. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 75000 and LOA of 250m.

Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 40.00 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-01 and end on 2023-10-10. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 5000MT Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Ocean Freight Brokers
